title: Ciena (CIEN): Rethinking Valuation After Upgraded 2026 Growth Outlook and AI Data Center Demand Boost
description: Ciena (CIEN) just raised the bar for fiscal 2026, lifting its revenue growth outlook on the back of stronger demand from hyperscale and AI data center customers and new architectures like Scaleacross. See our latest analysis for Ciena. The raised guidance comes on top of a string of upbeat catalysts, including stronger fourth quarter revenue, a solid full year 2025 earnings finish, and the Nubis acquisition that deepens Ciena’s reach into data center optics. With the share price up 66.47%...

title: AI tool to detect hidden health distress wins international hackathon
description: The goal of Aurion is to reduce missed emotional cues and workload of CHWs so that they can focus more on giving people the care they need.The post AI tool to detect hidden health distress wins international hackathon first appeared on University of Hawaiʻi System News.
